attributes.action: Pay mother's to stay at home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pay mother's a reasonable wage to stay at home and bring there children up until at least they go to primary school and then let the mothers have the option of either going back to work or being paid a reduced salary until they are 11.  This will reduce benefit fraud and help our children to become more grounded and secure persons
